short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CustomerWiz helps create up-to-the-minute relevant sales messaging by using your customers' and prospectsâ€™ words.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once you have a CustomerWiz account, use the extension to quickly:
- Access your snippets 
- Search and filter snippets 
- Copy snippets to clipboard and paste them into emails and call scripts
